effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 816,993 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 312,273.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 398 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,844 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 206 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,235 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,235 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: You champion the cause of Gnomeregan.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
